boardgame.name: Le Bien _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Le Malt
Heaven _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Ale
boardgame.description: You have been assigned to lead an ancient monastery and its brewery. Now it's your time to brew the best beer under God's blue sky!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The fine art of brewing beer demands your best timing. In order to get the best results of your production, you have to provide your cloister's garden with fertile resources and the right number of monks helping with the harvest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; but keep your brewmaster in mind as he is ready and eager to refine each and every one of your barrels!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Heaven _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Ale, you have to overcome the harsh competition of your fellow players. There is a fine balance between upgrading your cloister's garden and harvesting the resources you need to fill your barrels. Only those who manage to keep a cool head are able to win the race for the best beer!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Episode 30: Islebound, Heaven _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Ale, Dastardly Dirigibles, Hardback, High Treason!

RDTN Episode 136: Hunt for the Ring, Heaven _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Ale, Muse, Finished!, and Lotus

In European countries shipping costs of Packages up to 2,0 kg are normally 14,- Euros and up to 5,-kg are 18,- Euros. Other countries are 18,- Euros up to 2,- kg weight, over 2,0 to 10 kg it is more than 37 till 46 Euros!
